archimate:Requirement.name: TS.1.4.3d: d) analysing patterns of system and network user activities (e.g. usual time, frequency and location of access; and use of privileged access rights or powerful system utilities)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
